meanings.definition: In an untiring manner; without becoming tired or fatigued.
meanings.sent1: She worked untiringly on her homework until it was perfect.
meanings.sent2: He continued untiringly running the marathon, never giving up.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum cleaner moved untiringly around the house, cleaning every corner.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed untiringly, never stopping on its journey to the sea.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone untiringly, providing warmth and light to the earth.
